Open the Contacts app from the home screen.
Open the Phone app, displaying the contacts list with options like "Create new contact" and existing contacts like "Arthur Wang" and "Mariam Pereira".
Click the "Mobile" label dropdown to select a different label for the phone number.
Click the "Mobile" option to set the phone number label.
Click the "First name" text field to bring up the keyboard and allow text input.
Type "John" into the "Last name" field.
Type "Doe" into the "Last name" field.
Type '1234567890' into the 'Phone' field.
Scroll down to reveal the email input field.
